txt.en: You have become a proficient Journeyman Cook! You may now use Expert Cook recipes, or continue to work towards Journeyman Cook mastery.\n\nAdditionally, you are now eligible to join the <rgb=#00FF00>Cook's Guild</rgb>, a special reputation faction open only to Expert Cooks. To join the Cook's Guild, seek out a Master or Mistress of Crafting Guilds
